full_description:
Asus Zenfone 10 Smartphone (8/128GB)

The Asus Zenfone 10 proves you can have power and compactness without having to pick! The newest memory and storage technologies, along with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 Mobile Platform, are readily available. The new big thing is small, with the lively Zenfone 10 being the ideal hand-sized device, packing a ton of style and powerful performance. It has all the features you need for mobile independence, including a quick Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, an innovative camera, and fashionable colors that let you express your style. Asus Zenfone 10 AI Object Sense divides the image into distinct pieces, which our program then optimizes separately. This indicates that the picture seems as good as it can without requiring any editing on your part. This preserves every detail by using the unprocessed (RAW) files that the sensor took, so even at close range, your photographs are crisper. The Zenfone 10's front camera, which uses RGBW technology, produces higher-quality selfies in low light. When viewing an image in low light, white pixels are added to the standard RGB pixels to enhance overall image quality. The camera modes of the Asus Zenfone 10 have been enhanced, making it ideal for many aspects of daily life. Light Trail mode now allows you to take handheld, tripod-free professional-caliber shots, and Portrait mode has been improved with additional customizable zoom settings. The Zenfone 10's battery life won't let you down thanks to its improved 4300 mAh8 battery and power-efficient components! Furthermore, it now has 15-watt wireless charging due to user demand. Like us, Zenfone 10 is passionate about our planet. Our goal is to use as few petrochemicals as possible, and its environmentally friendly polycarbonate back cover made of biobased materials aids in this effort. Made entirely of recycled paper and inked with soy, the package is intended to be recyclable for environmentally friendly disposal.

Feel Harmonizing Colors With Zenfone 10

The Zenfone 10 is available in five vibrant colors, including the new Aurora Green, Eclipse Red, and Comet White in addition to the well-known Starry Blue and Midnight Black, all of which are inspired by the harmonious hues of the universe. Elevate your look with the latest Zenfone model.

50MP Main Camera with 6-axis Hybrid Gimbal Stabilizer

With its innovative adaptive EIS, which uses the gyro to detect movement and allows for dynamic change of the field of view's size to ensure that your video is always rock-steady, the Asus Zenfone 10 elevates video stability to a whole new level. Moreover, OZO Audio technology lets you record in rich, high-fidelity 3D surround sound or remove wind noise for clear recordings. The amazing 6-Axis Hybrid Gimbal Stabilizer 2.0 now features updated Electronic Image Stabilization (EIS) software, fast auto-focus, and hardware anti-shake OIS to give you even smoother films and shake-free photos while you're moving.

Compactness, Big Power

Your hand and your lifestyle are well suited to the incredibly light Asus Zenfone 10. Has your camera ever reacted too slowly, causing you to miss a moment, the Zenfone 10 will solve this issue for you. Now, all it takes is two presses of the volume key to capture the moment.

144Hz Smoothness

With the Zenfone 10's 144Hz refresh rate, you can play games with unprecedented smoothness or relax while viewing movies with vibrant, lifelike colors. It's a portable theater the size of your hand.

Swiping the Side-Mounted ZenTouch 2.0

Your favorite tasks, like opening your phone, controlling movie playback, browsing the web, and reading notifications, are instantly accessible with a simple swipe of the side-mounted ZenTouch key. With the latest version of Edge Tool, the Asus ZenFone 10 allows you to use your thumb to reach both the control panel and your preferred apps.

Dual Stereo Speakers

With assistance from Dirac's audio specialists, the Zenfone 10's dual stereo speakers produce crisp, strong sound, and its Dirac Virtuo technology produces incredible theater-like spatial sound. It's ideal for games and immersive media.

IP68 Water Resistance

The Zenfone 10's IP68 water resistance allows you to fully enjoy your daily life even in the event of unexpected splashes.

full_description:
Asus Zenfone 10 Smartphone (16/512GB)

The Asus Zenfone 10 stands out with its amazing 5.9-inch Super AMOLED display, which features a fantastic 144Hz refresh rate and HDR10+ compatibility for a visually engaging experience. With its 20:9 aspect ratio, 1080 x 2400 pixel resolution, 800 nits of brightness, and Corning Gorilla Glass Victus protection, the Asus Zenfone 10 is expected to deliver vivid images and long-lasting performance. Strong performance is provided by the octa-core CPU, which is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 and has Cortex-X3, Cortex-A715, Cortex-A710, and Cortex-A510 cores. The Adreno 740 GPU will be appreciated by gamers, especially as it can run games at 144 frames per second. With a path to upgrade to Android 14, the phone runs Android 13 and is always up to date with the newest software. The dual back layout of the camera equipment, which has a 50MP primary lens and a 13MP ultrawide lens that can record 8K video, is impressive. The 32MP front camera will appeal to selfie enthusiasts. Wi-Fi 6e/7, Bluetooth 5.3, and NFC are among the connectivity choices available. GPS, GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO, QZSS, and NavIC are all part of the sophisticated navigation system. The 4300mAh battery has three different charging modes: 15W wireless, 5W reverse wired, and 30W wired. The Asus Zenfone 10, measuring 146.5 x 68.1 x 9.4 mm and weighing 172g, has a streamlined body with a glass front, an aluminum frame, and a plastic back that strikes a mix of elegance and functionality. All things considered, it's a formidable apparatus that appeals to those looking for excellent visual clarity, robust functionality, and flexible camera options.
